channel.title: Runserver error
channel.description:
Ok so i edited my item.cfg and made a perfect ring and whenever i run my runserver i get this error [code]EmpireScape is now on. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:187) [/code] any idea why and how to fix this?
EDIT: Nvm i fixed it my ring works now no errors!

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @hawkfrost57 hawkfrost57
item.description:
@hawkfrost57 wrote:

i did use tab

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Always use tabs rather than spaces when editing configuration files.

Read full topic

Ok so i edited my item.cfg and made a perfect ring and whenever i run my runserver i get this error

EmpireScape is now on. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:187)
any idea why and how to fix this?
